content:
Public stream created by Tim Teatro. Description:

Questions and errata for the textbook
Nathanael Arkor changed the access permissions for this stream from Public to Web-public.

Matteo Capucci (he/him) changed the posting permissions for this stream:

  • Old permissions: All stream members can post.
  • New permissions: Only organization administrators and moderators can post.

Matteo Capucci (he/him) changed the description for this stream.

  • Old description:

Questions and errata for the textbook

  • New description:

Deprecated, use #learning: reading & references instead, or #learning: questions. Questions and errata for the textbook
Matteo Capucci (he/him) renamed stream learning: Polynomial Functors book by Niu and Spivak to deprecated: Polynomial Functors book by Niu and Spivak.
